Effects.Full:
Frost Barrier: Exhausts the Frost Barrier's HP to negate damage. If the Frost Barrier is broken, inflicts Chill on the unit that broke it for 1 turn. This is considered as a Ice type buff and cannot be dispelled

Solidification: Decreases Movement Speed by 1 tile; at the end of the action, if the holder has 2 layers of Solidification, it is converted into Chill, which lasts for 1 turn. Solidification can be stacked up to 2 layers. This is considered as a Ice type debuff

Chill: Cannot move or be displaced. This is considered as a Ice type debuff

Defense Support: Increases DEF equivalent to 30% of the caster's initial DEF. This effect can be stacked up to 4 times, and cannot be dispelled

Defensive Recovery I: After taking damage from an active attack, recovers HP equivalent to 10% of the holder's max HP. This is considered as a buff

Avalanche: Increases the number of stacks when the holder is inflicted with other Ice type debuffs by 1. When the number of stacks reaches 5, decreases the holder's Stability Gauge by 8 fixed points. This is considered as a Ice type debuff

Panic: Unable to be controlled. Automatically moves away from the unit that applied this effect. This effect is removed when the unit that applied this effect dies

Stun: Unable to take action

Taunt: Unable to be controlled. Forced to use normal attack against the unit that applied this effect. Effect is dispelled when the unit that applied this effect dies

Induce: Unable to be controlled. Forced to move towards the unit that applied this effect. Effect is dispelled when the unit that applied this effect dies

Paralysis: Unable to execute commands. Unable to use normal attacks or skills. This effect is considered as an Electric type debuff

Frostguard Shield: Decreases damage received by 30%. Decreases the number of stacks by 1 after being attacked. This effect can be stacked up to 5 times. This is considered as a Ice type buff and cannot be dispelled

Frost: Applies Solidification on enemies on this tile after the end of their action for 2 turns, and inflicts Ice weakness on the enemy standing on it after the end of their action. This tile is considered as a Ice type tile

Cover: Decreases damage dealt to Stability Gauge by 2 points; 1 layer is consumed for every 1 instance of damage to Stability Gauge received. Can be stacked up to a maximum of 3 layers

Continuous Heal I: At the end of the action, recovers HP equivalent to 20% of the holder's max HP. This is considered as a buff

DEF Increase II: Increases DEF by 30%. This is considered as a buff

DEF Increase III: Increases DEF by 40%. This is considered as a buff

Action Support: This is considered as a Support attack. Attacks once. Cannot be triggered by Support attacks

CRIT DMG Increase I: Increases CRIT DMG by 10%. This is considered as a buff

Quick Step: Increases range of Action Support by 1 tile. This effect cannot be dispelled

Guardian of the Light: Increases Ice damage dealt by 15%. This effect cannot be dispelled

Basic.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 6 tile radius and deals Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK to it

Skill.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 6 tile radius and deals Ice damage equivalent to 100% ATK to it. Decreases the CRIT rate of this skill by 100%, and additionally deals fixed damage equivalent to 50% DEF. For each ally within a 6 tile radius, increases damage dealt to Stability Gauge by 2 points
Skill.Vertebrae 1: If this skill causes the enemy to enter into Stability Break, increases fixed damage dealt to 125% DEF
Skill.Fixed Key 2: Winter's Wrath: After this skill is used, if the enemy's Stability is broken, increases Stability Gauge by 2 points

Skill2.Description: Selects an ally within a 6 tile radius, applies Frost Barrier for 2 turns and increase Stability Gauge by 2 points. Frost Barrier can absorb damage equivalent to 130% of Suomi's initial ATK, but cannot exceed more than 100% of the ally's HP. For each enemy within a 5 tile radius of the ally, applies 1 stack of Defense Support on the ally for 2 turns
Skill2.Vertebrae 3: Applies Defensive Recovery I on the ally for 2 turns. If the enemy is a large target, applies an additional layer of Defense Support
Skill2.Fixed Key 4: Grace of the Snow: When this skill is used, if the ally's HP is below 80%, increases the ally's Contamination Gauge by 1 point

Ultimate.Description:
Selects a tile within a 6 tile radius, deals fixed damage equivalent to 50% DEF to all enemy targets within a 3 tile radius, and applies 2 stacks of Avalanche

Increases Stability Gauge by 2 points for all allies, dispels 1 debuff and Taunt. Applies Frost Barrier that lasts for 3 turns and 1 stack of Frostguard Shield. Frost Barrier can absorb damage equivalent to 100% of Suomi's initial ATK, but cannot exceed more than 100% of the ally's HP

After this skill is used, creates Frost tiles in a snowflake shaped area with a 3 tile radius around the selected tile for 3 turns
Ultimate.Vertebrae 3:
Increases the number of stacks of Avalanche applied by 1

Recovers HP equivalent to 30% of Suomi's max HP for all allies, increases Stability Gauge by an additional 4 points for all allies. All allies (excluding Suomi) gains an additional stack of Frostguard Shield

If any ally is at full health before HP recovery, applies 1 stack of Cover and Continuous Heal I that lasts for 3 turns to that ally
Ultimate.Vertebrae 5:
Applies DEF Increase II for all allies for 3 turns, dispels 2 additional debuffs, and also dispels Panic, Induce and Stun

Increases HP restored to 50% of Suomi's max HP, and increases the radius of the area where Frost tiles are created by 1 tile

Increases the effect of DEF Increase II by 30%. This cannot exceed 150% of the target's max HP

Passive.Description:
At the end of the action, increases Contamination Gauge by 2 points, and recovers HP equivalent to 5% of Suomi's max HP for all allies within a 6 tile radius. If the ally's HP is below 50%, increases HP restored to 10% of Suomi's max HP

When any ally (excluding Suomi) uses normal attack or skill, Suomi applies 1 stack of Avalanche to a random enemy within a 6 tile radius of self

If an ally dealt single target damage to an enemy within attack range, Suomi activates Action Support against the enemy first, dealing Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK and 3 Stability Damage to it, and applies CRIT DMG Increase I on the ally for 2 turns. This effect can be triggered up to 2 times per turn. If Suomi's HP is above 80%, gains Quick Step
Passive.Vertebrae 4:
If the ally has Frost Barrier, applies Guardian of the Light

Quick Step now increases the range of Action Support by 2 tiles
Passive.Vertebrae 6:
New effect is added for Guardian of the Light - when the holder is attacked, if Frost Barrier did not break, decreases the attacker's Stability Gauge by 1 fixed point

Increases the number of Action Support per round by 1 time, and increases Stability Gauge by 1 point for all allies within a 4 tile radius of self

1.Effect:
Increases the number of stacks of Avalanche applied by 1

Recovers HP equivalent to 30% of Suomi's max HP for all allies, increases Stability Gauge by an additional 4 points for all allies. All allies (excluding Suomi) gains an additional stack of Frostguard Shield. If any ally is at full health before HP recovery, applies 1 stack of Cover and Continuous Heal I that lasts for 3 turns to that ally

2.Effect:
If the ally has Frost Barrier, applies Guardian of the Light

Quick Step now increases the range of Action Support by 2 tiles

3.Effect: Applies Defensive Recovery I on the ally for 2 turns. If the enemy is a large target, applies an additional layer of Defense Support

4.Effect: If this skill causes the enemy to enter into Stability Break, increases fixed damage dealt to 125% DEF

5.Effect:
New effect is added for Guardian of the Light - when the holder is attacked, if Frost Barrier did not break, decreases the attacker's Stability Gauge by 1 fixed point

Increases the number of Action Support per round by 1 time, and increases Stability Gauge by 1 point for all allies within a 4 tile radius of self

6.Effect:
Applies DEF Increase II for all allies for 3 turns, dispels 2 additional debuffs, and also dispels Panic, Induce and Stun

Increases HP restored to 50% of Suomi's max HP, and increases the radius of the area where Frost tiles are created by 1 tile. Increases the effect of DEF Increase II by 30%. This cannot exceed 150% of the target's max HP

7.Effect: Winter's Wrath: After this skill is used, if the enemy's Stability is broken, increases Stability Gauge by 2 points

8.Effect: At the start of the battle, increases Contamination Gauge by 3 points

9.Effect: Grace of the Snow: When this skill is used, if the ally's HP is below 80%, increases the ally's Contamination Gauge by 1 point

10.Effect: At the start of the turn, for each ally (excluding Suomi) whose HP is below 80%, increases Movement Speed by 1 tile

11.Effect: When Suomi is inflicted with Stun, Taunt, or Paralysis, immediately dispels the effect, and becomes immune to Stun, Taunt and Paralysis for 1 turn and applies a Frost Barrier that lasts for 3 turns. Frost Barrier can absorb damage equivalent to 60% of Suomi's initial ATK, but cannot exceed more than 100% of Suomi's max HP. This effect can be activated once per battle

12.Effect: At the end of the action, if Suomi's Stability Gauge is more than 0 points, recovers HP equivalent to 10% max HP and increases Stability Gauge by 1 point

13.Effect: DEF +5.0% / When the holder's HP is below 80%, recovers HP equivalent to 15% of the holder's max HP, and gains DEF Increase III for 2 turns. This effect can be activated once per battle
